Posts.Content: flowerbomb thanks so much made me well up that comment fantastic your all clear now I feel so lucky I was sat behind a lady she had been diagnosed and looked broken i didn't know her but I gave her a hug Â  flannel on your boob made me giggle I had flannel on mine a mine was huge last night from the biopsy your all fantastic people hugs and love to you all xx
Posts.Title: breast clinic tomorow im worried sick

Posts.Content: hi my name is Jo I'm 34 been really run down past few months so had general check up with gp and asked me if I check my breasts I am ashamed to say not really I only have little boobs so I just assumed I would notice a change so I went home and done the check felt a lump about one inch above my nipple and when I lay back my nipple inverts slightly the lump feels weird it doesn't hurt seems attached to maybe breast tissue as under the lump it feels lumpy ahhh checked under my armpit no swelling but can feel several swollen lymph nodes on the side of my breast the armpit doctor has checked sent a referal to one stop clinic tomorrow I've waited two weeks and tomorrow is d day I'm so frightend what ifs my head is on over time trying to think just a cyst but the nagging there so sorry for waffling and knowing your all mostly diagnosed and fighting this terrible disease feel a fraud but don't know who else to talk too
Posts.Title: breast clinic tomorow im worried sick

Posts.Content: thanks all for your replies feel less anxious now I've let all that built up anxiety out , I will keep positive not sure if my partner can get the day off work yet to come but if not ill be ok thanks for the advice for the painkillers not great with pain even tho I've had four children this should be a doddle ! Denzilpants thank you its a emotional roller coaster glad to here you have all clear x
Posts.Title: breast clinic tomorow im worried sick

Posts.Content: thank you all so much for your kind words and support really helped me today well I'm out of the woods thank goodness I have loads of bloody cysts to many to count according to doctor ! I've had some tissue samples taken just to be on the safe side and check them in probably going to be a regular now at the clinic as she said I'm likely to get them till menopause but to make sure I go back if any feel different. All I cam say is how grateful and thankful for all of you being there to all stay strong and fight your all always now will be in my thoughts and ill come up with something wacky to do to raise money for cancer research Xxx
Posts.Title: breast clinic tomorow im worried sick
